name: KAI U
description:
Kai U. (Kaiju University) Is an intense runner where you must obtain the highest grade to graduate and be a pride among your specie. Face the heavy machinery of humans by pressing the correct key at the right time to make use of your skills as a Kaiju; If you die don’t worry, you only return to your basic egg form where you can learn powerful abilities, like shot lasers and blow green fire.

But remember, it’s the final test so: the fewer special skills you have, the better your grade will be.

We appreciate any feedback you can give us and let us know if you would like to see more content from KAI U.

from grimoire games hope you enjoy it
